definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
to file for investigation/to prosecute (a case)

sentences.english: He said some secrecy was important to avoid detection by the two governments.
sentences.chinese: 他表示爲避免兩國政府偵查發現，保密工作很重要。

sentences.english: The scout with shoulder-straps shouted on the outermost route as a routine.
sentences.chinese: 戴肩章的偵查員按例在最核心的線路上叫嚷。

sentences.english: Wolves are scared of everything new but feel like investigating it.
sentences.chinese: 野狼害怕所有新事物，但喜歡偵查。

sentences.english: The use of informants detection has become an important means in investigation practice.
sentences.chinese: 利用線人破案已成爲各國偵查實踐中的重要手段。

sentences.english: ASDIC is an acronym for antisubmarine detection investigation committee.
sentences.chinese: 是“反潛艇偵查調查委員會”的縮寫形式。

sentences.english: The police is baffle and sherlock holm is call in to investigate.
sentences.chinese: 警方被難住了，於是請福爾摩斯前來偵查。

sentences.english: But that just slows him down.
sentences.chinese: 但那僅能放慢他的偵查進程。

sentences.english: The fourth proposal is nailing down the conditions of supplemental investigation voluntarily.
sentences.chinese: 四是要明確自行補充偵查的適用條件。

sentences.english: Lynchburg surrendered to a Federal scouting party.
sentences.chinese: 林奇堡向聯邦的偵查軍投降。

sentences.english: The key to this type of case is to ascertain the investigation scope.
sentences.chinese: 破獲系列案件的關鍵是正確地劃定偵查範圍。

sentences.english: Information is the promise and base of investigation and decision .
sentences.chinese: 情報信息是偵查決策的前提和基礎。

sentences.english: The identification of the criminal investigation phase is one of the most commonly used means of investigation.
sentences.chinese: 刑事偵查階段的辨認是一種最常用的偵查手段。

sentences.english: The identification of the criminal investigation phase is one of the most commonly used means of investigation.
sentences.chinese: 刑事偵查階段的辨認是一種最常用的偵查手段。

sentences.english: The theory of individualism is the specific basic theory of criminal investigation.
sentences.chinese: 同一認定原理是偵查學的特定基礎理論。

sentences.english: Modern investigation and supervision originates from law supervision theory of Soviet Russia and Russia law system.
sentences.chinese: 現代的偵查監督淵源於蘇俄法系的法律監督理論。

sentences.english: Panzer Elite Scout car health increased from 220 to 260.
sentences.chinese: 裝甲精英偵查車生命值從220增加到260。

definition: to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down (the perpetrator of a crime, an escaped prisoner etc)
to search for and seize (criminals, smuggled goods etc)
